translation.en: [man 1] Mayday, mayday! We are under attack.
translation.ja: メイデイ 攻撃を受けた

translation.en: Under attack from our own people.
They just started shooting. They took out everyone.
-[man 2] Why are they doing this? -[man 1] They're ours. What's happening?
translation.ja: 理由は？ 味方なのになぜ？

translation.en: [man 1] How many are there?
[man 2] They're everywhere! They're going for the command center.
translation.ja: 大勢だ　司令室に来る

translation.en: They're going to take out the interceptors.
translation.ja: システムを壊す気だ 迎撃を担う早期警戒局は ２か所のみ

translation.en: [man 1] They're killing us, they're killing everybody!
They reached the command center. I can't hold them off!
translation.ja: 司令室を守りきれない

translation.en: [man 2] Somebody help us! Please, send help!
[man 1] We've got to call SBX-1.
[man 2] We can't! They destroyed the transmitter!
[man 1] This is Fort Greely. We have been overrun. Fort Greely--
translation.ja: フォート･グリーリーだ 制圧された フォート･グリーリーだ 制圧された 〝フォート･グリーリー ミサイル防衛複合施設〞

translation.en: [pilot] Coming up on SBX-1 now, Captain.
translation.ja: まもなくです　大尉

translation.en: [pilot] SBX-1 this is Eagle 6-7.
I got your new missile system specialist here with me.
translation.ja: 新任の特技兵を移送する

translation.en: Request permission to commence final approach.
[operator] Eagle 6-7 this is SBX-1, you're cleared for landing.
Welcome to the middle of nowhere.
Captain Collins, I'm Ensign Washington.
translation.ja: コリンズ大尉 ワシントン少尉です

translation.en: Welcome to SBX-1, or should I say "welcome back."
translation.ja: ようこそ と言うよりおかえりなさい

translation.en: -Thanks. -[Washington] Colonel's waiting for you.
translation.ja: ありがとう 大佐がお待ちです

translation.en: I heard you grew up in Spain at a base your dad was posted at.
translation.ja: 父上が配属だったスペインで お育ちとか

translation.en: [male voice] Come in.
Captain Collins reporting, sir.
At ease.
Good to see you again, JJ.
You remember Captain Welsh?
Yes, sir. You were just taking over when I rotated out.
translation.ja: ええ 私の交代時に 着任されました

translation.en: Don't you mean escaped?
[Welsh] Listen to this.
-Give us a minute, would you, Lou? -You bet.
See if you can get us an update on that Russian sub.
translation.ja: ロシアの潜水艦の確認を

translation.en: Well, as you can see, everything's pretty much the way you left it.
translation.ja: さて 見てのとおり 何も変わってない

translation.en: Navy runs the boat, Army handles the missiles,
translation.ja: 海軍は船 陸軍はミサイル

translation.en: and everyone wants to be anywhere but here.
-Have you spoke with the board? -Three times.
translation.ja: 委員会とは？ ３回 話した

translation.en: [Collins] Showed them my record? My reviews?
Everything.
This was the best you could do?
Sorry.
[Marshall] No, it's okay.
I thought I was done with this shit.
[Marshall] I know.
Never going to change, is it?
Thank you for taking me back.
For the record, I believed you from the start.
translation.ja: 私は最初から信じてたよ

translation.en: [Washington] We got you down here.
One of our guys nabbed your old room. Sorry about that.
translation.ja: 前の部屋は使われてて すみません

translation.en: Oh, ma'am?
Just want to say all of us girls are really proud of what you did.
translation.ja: 女性はみんな 大尉を誇りに思ってます

translation.en: What happened to you, well it's…
translation.ja: あなたに起きたことは 他の大勢にも起きました

translation.en: It's happened to a lot of us,
translation.ja: 他の大勢にも起きました

translation.en: and I just wanted you to know that.
I need you in the command center with your sidearm now.
translation.ja: すぐ銃を持って司令室へ

translation.en: We have an active shooter situation at Fort Greely.
translation.ja: フォート･グリーリーで 銃撃だ

translation.en: Outsider?
No, one of ours. Looks like more than one.
translation.ja: 内部の犯行で複数犯だ

translation.en: [Collins] Interceptors secure?
[Marshall] Unknown.
[Collins] How bad is it?
Greely's gone dark. No calls in or out.
translation.ja: グリーリーの応答なし

translation.en: We're getting all our information off Twitter.
[Marshall] Do we have Fort Greely on the line?
[soldier] Not yet, sir.
[Marshall] You know what to do.
Is Greely being jammed?
No. It's like someone turned off the system at the source.
translation.ja: 電源が切られたようです

translation.en: Corporal Rahul Shah. Joined us six months ago.
translation.ja: ラウル･シャー 半年前に入隊した

translation.en: Captain.
Corporal.
And you remember Beaver.
Miss me, Captain?
Not even once.
[Marshall] How's our Russian friend?
[Beaver] He's back.
Forty miles out and just sitting there like a turd in a swimming pool.
translation.ja: 64キロ先　プールのクソだな 64キロ先　プールのクソだな 〝接近警告〞

translation.en: -[Collins] What friend? -Russian attack sub.
translation.ja: 〝接近警告〞 〝接近警告〞 友達？ 〝接近警告〞 〝接近警告〞 攻撃型潜水艦だ

translation.en: Been nosing about for months.
translation.ja: 〝接近警告〞 攻撃型潜水艦だ 数か月前から 追い払っても戻ってくる

translation.en: Our subs keep chasing him away and he keeps coming back.
translation.ja: 数か月前から 追い払っても戻ってくる

translation.en: What the hell's going on up there?
Hey. We still on for tonight?
translation.ja: おい 今夜もやるよな

translation.en: Dude, what?
Poker. I want to whip them janitors like last time.
translation.ja: ポーカーだ また用務員に勝つ

translation.en: -Not now, Beaver. -What's wrong with now?
We're in an emergency.
Man, this ain't no emergency.
It's one crackpot with a grudge.
I'd invite you, ma'am,
but there'll probably be a bit of locker room talk.
translation.ja: 下品な話も出るけどな

translation.en: I've been practicing against some of the best players in the world
translation.ja: 俺は最高の訓練を受けてきた

translation.en: with this little green guy.
Thing's probably more powerful than this entire room.
translation.ja: 司令室よりも賢いんだ

translation.en: Great story, Beaver. In what chapter do you shut the fuck up?
translation.ja: 壮大なストーリーね どこまで話せば満足する？

translation.en: Copy that, STRATCOM.
Sir, SBX-1 has just been assigned primary early warning status
translation.ja: 大佐 グリーリー復活まで 我々が対応しろとのことです

translation.en: while Greely's offline.
translation.ja: グリーリー復活まで 我々が対応しろとのことです

translation.en: All right, as of this moment we're the only interceptor platform protecting the United States from a nuclear missile attack.
translation.ja: 諸君　核ミサイルから 国を守れるのは我々だけだ

translation.en: Square your shit away. Focus on the job you've been trained to do.
Sir, we sure this is not some kind of drill or emergency test--
translation.ja: 大佐　訓練かテストでは？

translation.en: Quiet.
NSA is relaying chatter from Russia.
Kremlin just received a priority alert from the ICBM missile base in Tavlinka.
translation.ja: クレムリンに タブリンカ基地から報告

translation.en: Tavlinka site under hostile attack.
translation.ja: 基地が攻撃を受け 複数の犠牲者 基地が攻撃を受け 複数の犠牲者 〝ロシア　タブリンカ〞

translation.en: Multiple casualties.
translation.ja: 基地が攻撃を受け 複数の犠牲者 〝ロシア　タブリンカ〞 基地が攻撃を受け 複数の犠牲者

translation.en: Unauthorized missile removal.
translation.ja: 無許可のミサイル撤去

translation.en: No way.
Sixteen Topol-M mobile missiles unaccounted for.
translation.ja: トーポリＭ16発が行方不明

translation.en: You're saying someone stole 16 ICBMs?
I'm not saying it. The Russians are.
Sir, Greely goes dark and within 10 minutes a Russian base reports stolen nukes?
translation.ja: グリーリーが消え 10分以内に核盗難の報告？

translation.en: Look, Greely's real, but this has to be a Russian exercise.
translation.ja: 盗難はロシアの演習だろう

translation.en: If it were real, the Pentagon would've called us by now.
translation.ja: 本物なら ペンタゴンから電話が来る

translation.en: SBX-1.
Yes, sir.
We are, sir.
It just came in now, sir.
We will, sir.
[in Russian] We have 16 missiles aimed at 16 American cities.
translation.ja: 〈アメリカの16都市を ミサイルで狙っている〉

translation.en: After this day, America will no longer exist.
translation.ja: 〈今日以降 アメリカは消滅する〉

translation.en: Jesus.
How do you steal nuclear missiles?
Had to have been an inside job. You can't just walk in--
Doesn't matter how they did it. What matters is those missiles are mobile.
translation.ja: どうでもいい ミサイルは動かせる

translation.en: They can hide their nukes anywhere. Our satellites won't spot them till they launch.
translation.ja: 核も隠せるから 発射まで分からない

translation.en: Captain.
[Marshall] JJ.
This is on us now, you understand?
[Collins] Yes, sir.
We're the only thing standing between America and Armageddon.
translation.ja: 国を守れるのは我々だけだ

translation.en: You up for this?
Don't worry about me, sir.
Sorry. Had to ask.
translation.ja: 悪いが確認したくてな

translation.en: I'll start the emergency lockdown.
You do that.
I need to find Welsh and secure the HVAR codes.
translation.ja: ウェルシュから ＨＶＡＲコードを受け取る

translation.en: Sir, wait
Sir.
If they had people inside Tavlinka, and the shooters at Greely were all ours,
translation.ja: タブリンカやグリーリーが 内部の犯行なら

translation.en: they might have someone… here.
translation.ja: 内通者は… ここにも

translation.en: Go.
[man] The keycard!
[man] The keycard! Get the keycard!
Mikael! The door. Open the door!
translation.ja: ミカエル！　扉を開けろ

translation.en: Goddammit, you're a big boy.
Did you send the SOS?
Did you just stab that dude in the eye with your gun?
Yeah. Did you send the SOS?
Yeah, I sent it. They told me to stand by.
translation.ja: ああ　待てと言われた

translation.en: [Collins] How is Beaver?
Bullet clipped him. He's unconscious, but he'll be okay.
translation.ja: 弾が当たった 意識はないが大丈夫だ

translation.en: Is that acid?
[Shah] Why would they bring acid?
Destroy the circuitry.
Make this place useless.
What are we going to do?
You want to talk about it?
Leave now and you might escape with your life.
translation.ja: 今 去れば殺さないかも

translation.en: Let me in and you might escape with yours.
translation.ja: 扉を開ければ殺さないかも

translation.en: You are the terrorists who stole the missiles from Tavlinka?
translation.ja: ミサイル泥棒のテロリスト？

translation.en: [man] You know, it would be a hell of a coincidence if I wasn't.
translation.ja: 違うなら すごい偶然だな

translation.en: Put one on Beaver.
And the shooters at Greely?
Subcontractors.
It's a gig economy.
Can't work at a US base without an extensive background check.
translation.ja: 基地で働くには 身元を精査される

translation.en: You're telling me. The paperwork is a nightmare.
That would mean you've been planning this--
[man] For a very long time.
[Collins] How long is a very long time?
Six years.
Not going so well for you, is it?
No plan survives contact with the enemy completely intact.
translation.ja: 敵と接すれば 作戦は崩れるものだ

translation.en: Are we enemies? You sound American.
translation.ja: 敵？　アメリカ人同士よ

translation.en: [man] I am American.
And whether or not you and I are enemies is completely up to you.
translation.ja: 俺たちが敵同士かは 完全に君次第だ

translation.en: What's your name?
My name is Alexander Kessel.
translation.ja: アレグザンダー･ケッセル

translation.en: You say that like I should know it.
And now that you do, you will never forget it.
translation.ja: 二度と忘れられない 名前になるぞ

translation.en: How about I just call you "asshole"?
You know, usually it takes a woman a second date to reach that conclusion.
translation.ja: 普通の女は ２度目のデートで気づく

translation.en: Nothing usual about me.
You know, I'm kind of getting that.
So, Captain, seems as though you and I are at an impasse
translation.ja: 大尉 意見が合わなそうだ

translation.en: because I need to disable your command center so my people in Russia can fire those missiles.
translation.ja: 俺はミサイル発射のため 司令室を無力化したいが

translation.en: And you need to keep me out.
But, full disclosure,
I have contained or killed everyone else on this vessel,
translation.ja: 君以外は既に捕虜か死体だ

translation.en: so I will be getting into that room.
translation.ja: だから いずれは入れる

translation.en: Let me in now and I will spare your lives.
translation.ja: 今 入れれば命は助ける

translation.en: And let millions of Americans die?
I don't think you realize why someone joins the Army.
You are alone in the middle of the ocean,
miles from any port,
way beyond the nearest shipping lane.
No one is going to be able to get here and save you
translation.ja: 誰も助けてくれないぞ

translation.en: before I cut through these doors.
Hey, Shah, how many janitors are there?
I don't know. Six, seven?
-Which is it, six or seven? -[Shah] I don't know. I didn't hire them.
translation.ja: どっちよ さあ　担当じゃない

translation.en: This is a big rig. You couldn't have killed everyone so quickly.
translation.ja: 皆殺しの時間はなかったはず

translation.en: [Kessel] Nerve agent.
Released it through the A/C. Put 'em all right to sleep.
translation.ja: 空調に入れて眠らせた

translation.en: [snorts] Bullshit.
If it makes any difference, they felt nothing.
We did have to shoot them to be sure.
[Kessel] Don't worry.
The command center has its own A/C, and try as I might…
translation.ja: そこの空調は別だから…

translation.en: You can't access it.
Would we be having this awesome little conversation if I could?
translation.ja: でなきゃ会話などするか

translation.en: -SBX-1. This is Captain Collins. -Is this real?
-General Dyson. Where's Colonel Marshall? -[man] Everyone quiet.
translation.ja: ダイソン大将だ マーシャル大佐は？

translation.en: He's dead, sir.
Dead? What happened?
Six to seven terrorists disguised as janitors seized our vessel.
translation.ja: 用務員姿のテロリスト ６～７人が船を占拠

translation.en: They killed Marshall, they claim they have killed the crew,
translation.ja: 大佐を殺害　恐らく乗組員も

translation.en: -and tried to take the command center. -Tried?
translation.ja: 司令室に入ろうと 入ろうと？

translation.en: -And failed. -[Dyson] Who's there with you?
translation.ja: 失敗した 誰がいる？

translation.en: Corporals Shah and Baker. Baker's unconscious. Hit by a bullet.
translation.ja: 伍長のシャーとベイカー ベイカーは撃たれて気絶

translation.en: How secure are you?
They're using blowtorches to cut through the outer door.
translation.ja: 敵は火炎放射器で 外扉を切断中

translation.en: Best guess…
Sixty minutes.
Make that 30 minutes.
-[Dyson] And the inner door? -Same. I don't know.
translation.ja: 内扉は？ 変化なしかと

translation.en: What can you tell us about these terrorists?
American. Leader says his name is Alexander Kessel.
translation.ja: アメリカ人 アレグザンダー･ケッセル

translation.en: Get me a full background check on this guy. What else?
translation.ja: そいつを調べ上げろ 他は？

translation.en: They move like they've been trained, and they're using nerve agents.
translation.ja: 訓練されていて 神経剤を使います

translation.en: What's happening at Greely?
Shooters are dead.
Unfortunately, so are the computers that control the interceptors. Burned them all with acid.
translation.ja: だがコンピューターも 酸で破壊された

translation.en: So it's just us.
Afraid so.
A SEAL team is inbound to you. You have to hang on a little longer.
translation.ja: 特殊部隊(シールズ)が行くまで耐えろ

translation.en: -ETA? -Ninety minutes.
Are they joking?
-No, we are not joking. -[Collins] Madam President.
translation.ja: 本当の話よ 大統領

translation.en: The terrorists have 16 mobile missile launchers that we and the Russians cannot find.
translation.ja: ミサイル発射台16基の位置は 我々もロシアも分からない

translation.en: Only reason they haven't launched them yet is because you still have control of your interceptors.
translation.ja: 発射がまだなのは あなたが迎撃できるからよ

translation.en: The second you don't, they will launch those missiles on the United States.
translation.ja: そこが破られた瞬間 ミサイルは発射される

translation.en: Now, we don't have time to evacuate 16 cities,
translation.ja: 国民を避難させる時間はない

translation.en: so we're counting on you to keep those maniacs out of that room.
translation.ja: だからその部屋に 敵を入れないで

translation.en: Understood, Madam President.
translation.ja: 分かりました　大統領

translation.en: We'll get back to you soon. Keep us updated.
translation.ja: また連絡する　報告しろ

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Captain, hold that room.
translation.ja: 大尉　部屋を守り抜け

translation.en: [soldier] Let's move out! Go!
[operator] SEAL team, you are clear for immediate departure to SBX-1.
translation.ja: シールズ ＳＢＸ-１への飛行を許可

translation.en: Ninety minutes? There's no way we can last that long.
translation.ja: 90分も もつわけないだろ

translation.en: Not without a fight.
What? No. No, no.
I'm not a fighter. I'm a signal specialist.
I sit at a desk and stare at a screen, and know what? I like it.
translation.ja: 画面を見てるのが大好き

translation.en: Know why? Because nothing ever happens.
I mean, I haven't fired a gun since basic.
translation.ja: 訓練以降 撃ってない

translation.en: Don't worry. Guns still work the same.
Look, you can't count on me. You can't.
translation.ja: 当てにしないで ムリだ

translation.en: You surrender?
Do you?
Still quite enjoying fucking up your day.
translation.ja: あんたの夢を 楽しくぶち壊してる

translation.en: Do you know anything about the fall of Rome?
translation.ja: ローマの崩壊を知ってるか

translation.en: When the barbarians massed outside the city gates
translation.ja: 異民族は門を開けさせようと

translation.en: they did unspeakable things to try and force the Romans to let them in.
translation.ja: 異民族は門を開けさせようと 言葉にできない凶行に及んだ

translation.en: Exitus actum probat.
translation.ja: エクシトゥス･アクタ･ プロバト

translation.en: "The result justifies the deed."
You remember Captain Welsh?
He's a father of four and a grandfather of seven.
[Collins] This is not gonna work.
Open the doors.
You can't let him die.
I will not open these doors.
If you don't, I will kill him.
I will not open these doors.
Last chance.
No.
Kill anyone you want.
I will never open this door.
translation.ja: 扉は絶対 開けない

translation.en: We're going to die too, aren't we?
We are not gonna die.
They're gonna get in here. They're gonna kill us.
-Corporal. -There's nothing we can do to stop them!
translation.ja: 伍長 止められない

translation.en: Corporal Shah, they're not in here yet,
translation.ja: シャー伍長 敵はまだ来てない

translation.en: but if we're going to keep them out, I need you thinking clearly.
translation.ja: 入れないために あなたの頭が必要よ

translation.en: We still have a job to do, right?
Right.
So go back to your post and keep our scanners on Tavlinka.
translation.ja: 席に戻って タブリンカをスキャンして

translation.en: And if they launch?
We intercept.
We also need to figure out every way they can penetrate this room.
translation.ja: 侵入経路も すべて見つけないと

translation.en: Tunnel's the only direct way, in or out.
translation.ja: 直接にはトンネルだけだ

translation.en: What about indirect? Any new piping or conduits I should know about?
translation.ja: 間接的には？ 新しい配管は？

translation.en: Plumbing comes through a conduit in the floor too small for anyone to fit through.
translation.ja: 配管は床下で狭くて入れない

translation.en: Same for the cables.
What else could they do? Think.
What about blowing the radar dome?
Dome's reinforced even stronger than we are.
Same with the interceptors.
Get me eyes outside the hatches, top and bottom.
Get the shotgun.
Shoot him!
Shoot him now!
Looks like it was just the one.
When was the last time this thing was test fired?
translation.ja: 最後の試射は いつ？

translation.en: I don't know. Can it still work?
Not without blowing up in your face.
-What about your pistol? -Out.
[sighs] So we have no weapons.
Help me.
[Shah] Thanks for saving Turbo.
translation.ja: ターボを救ってくれた

translation.en: [Collins] Who?
Turbo, the turtle. My kids gave him to me.
translation.ja: 亀だ　子供がくれた

translation.en: How many kids you got?
Prisha, she's nine. Aditi, seven. And Kalyan, he's three.
translation.ja: プリシャは９歳 アディティは７歳 カリヤンは３歳だ

translation.en: I haven't seen them for six months.
Best thing you can do for them now is help me stop those missiles.
translation.ja: 今はミサイル阻止が 子供らのためになる

translation.en: Anything?
[Shah] They got everyone.
He's just going to keep buzzing till you answer.
translation.ja: 答えるまで鳴らす気だ

translation.en: [Shah] What do you want now?
Captain, you should see this.
translation.ja: 大尉　見たほうがいい

translation.en: Think you're the first one to throw that in my face?
Think you're gonna break me?
No. And yes.
-[Collins] It's gonna take more than that. -I've got more coming.
translation.ja: それじゃムリよ 他にもある

translation.en: No, you don't.
You're scrambling.
-[Kessel] Am I? -Desperately.
How so?
You're a planner.
Six years, you said.
Looking for ways to beat the security, getting your people aboard,
translation.ja: 警備をかいくぐる方法を探し 部下を紛れ込ませ

translation.en: you must have gone over and over these things
translation.ja: 何度も計画を練り直した

translation.en: until you were absolutely sure you planned for every possible outcome,
translation.ja: 完璧な計画だと 確信できるまでね

translation.en: but you couldn't plan for me.
translation.ja: でも私は想定外だった

translation.en: You know how I know?
Because I'm meant to be in Fort Hunter right now on my new post.
translation.ja: 元々の配属は別の基地で

translation.en: Only fell through late last night when they reassigned me here.
translation.ja: 昨夜遅く変更になったからよ

translation.en: And now…
Now you can't beat me.
I'll give you "unexpected."
But not unbeatable.
See, here's what I know.
I know that three years ago, you scored your dream job.
translation.ja: 君は３年前 夢の仕事に就いた

translation.en: Pentagon, three-star General.
translation.ja: ペンタゴンで中将が 上官となった

translation.en: A battlefield hero, his troops loved him.
translation.ja: 彼は人気者の戦場の英雄だ

translation.en: They were going to build a statue to the guy.
translation.ja: 像もできる予定だった

translation.en: And he promised to take you all the way to the top,
translation.ja: 中将は君の昇進を約束したが

translation.en: but then you learned the price you'd have to pay.
translation.ja: それには代償があった

translation.en: I know the Army review board just decided you made it all up.
translation.ja: 委員会は君のウソと決めつけ

translation.en: Threw you right back into the lion's den.
translation.ja: ライオンの穴へ送り戻した

translation.en: I know that three-star welcomed you with open arms.
translation.ja: 中将は君を再び歓迎した

translation.en: Because predators always want to show you exactly who's in charge.
translation.ja: 捕食者は 誰がボスか 示したがるからな

translation.en: Wait, that general got discharged.
Which means you beat him. You won.
translation.ja: つまり彼を倒したんだ

translation.en: She won the battle, not the war.
translation.ja: 争いに勝ったが戦いに負けた

translation.en: See, first came the hate mail.
The bounty hunt for these lewd photos…
translation.ja: 〝ウソつき〞〝裏切り者〞 写真への懸賞金 写真への懸賞金

translation.en: …then the death threats.
[Kessel] All from within the army that you so proudly served.
translation.ja: 誇りをもって 働いていた軍の中からだ

translation.en: Then finally…
that night.
[man] JJ! JJ!
JJ, come on!
Come on, wake up. JJ!
Come on. Wake up. Come back.
Papa?
It's okay, it's okay. Papa's here. It's okay. I got you.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　父さんが来たぞ

translation.en: Papa… sorry.
You are beatable, Captain.
It's been proven.
If you are so right,
then what am I doing here?
Why do I still wear the uniform?
War's not over yet, motherfucker.
translation.ja: 戦いは終わってない　クソめ

translation.en: You should be working with me.
In fact, I will give you 30 million dollars if you open these doors.
translation.ja: 扉を開けたら 3000万ドルやる

translation.en: I will have you flown to the country of your choosing
translation.ja: 好きな国に行かせてやろう

translation.en: where you can live the rest of your life in luxury.
translation.ja: 一生 ぜいたくできるぞ

translation.en: If anyone has earned the right to walk away from this, it's you.
translation.ja: 君には ここから立ち去る権利がある

translation.en: Thirty million dollars. What did the Army ever give you?
translation.ja: 3000万ドルだぞ 軍は何を与えた？

translation.en: Your depressing old job in the middle of nowhere, where they can forget about you?
translation.ja: 中枢には程遠い 古くさい仕事？

translation.en: They don't care about you.
Open these doors.
Take back your power.
That's how you win a war.
[pilot] SEAL team is inbound to SBX-1. ETA 67 minutes.
translation.ja: シールズ ＳＢＸ-１到着まで67分

translation.en: [Collins] They're in.
Open the door and you leave here a wealthy woman.
translation.ja: 扉を開けろ リッチになれるぞ

translation.en: We still have time before you cut through this door.
translation.ja: 扉が落ちる前に時間がある

translation.en: -You really don't. -[gun cocks]
-[Collins] Beaver. -[Shah] What?
[Collins] Nice, Beaver.
Initiating satellite relay and EBS hack.
translation.ja: 衛星中継ハッキング開始

translation.en: We're in.
No, I have a new one.
ZSB, Zulu Sierra Bravo, 1-9-9-6.
translation.ja: ＺＳＢ ズールー･シエラ･ブラボー 1996

translation.en: And tell Danny to move in.
Are you hurt?
I've had worse.
It really didn't have to be this way.
translation.ja: 本来 必要ない悲劇だ

translation.en: If Corporal Baker doesn't get hit, we avoid all of this.
translation.ja: ベイカーが撃たれなければな

translation.en: If you're gonna kill me, just kill me.
translation.ja: マンスプレイニングは結構

translation.en: No mansplaining.
I gave you choices.
It was your decision to become enemies.
You were with them this whole time?
Yeah.
[Shah grunts] Traitor.
America's the traitor.
[Collins] Always were full of shit, Beaver.
[Beaver] Ah, what do you know?
I love my country.
Hell, there was a time I would have even died for it. [sniffs]
translation.ja: 命をささげようとすらしてた

translation.en: Never too late.
Shut up.
It's because of immigrants like you and like you that I lost my job
translation.ja: お前らのような移民のせいで 失業したんだ

translation.en: and the government
took away my rights,
started making up all kinds of shit to scare me.
translation.ja: いろんな手で 俺を恐怖に陥れた

translation.en: [Beaver] Shit. I don't even recognize America these days.
translation.ja: クソ　もうアメリカなんか 消えちまった

translation.en: And that gives you the right to murder millions of people?
translation.ja: だから大勢を殺す権利が あると？

translation.en: Well, it gives me the right to start looking out for myself.
translation.ja: 食いぶちを稼ぐ権利が あるんだ

translation.en: And now I got ten million ways to do that.
translation.ja: 今じゃいくらでも方法がある

translation.en: Money? That's what this is about?
[Beaver] Uh, yeah. It's what America's about.
translation.ja: そうだよ　それがアメリカだ

translation.en: And if you don't get that, you obviously haven't been paying attention, Shah.
translation.ja: まだ分かってないなら 明らかに注意散漫だぞ

translation.en: Wake up, man.
Yeah, sure. Sure. Blame America. Blame the government.
translation.ja: 国や政府を 好きに責めればいい

translation.en: Blame everyone else but you.
That's what all losers do.
You just keep on talking, darlin'.
translation.ja: 話し続けろ　ダーリン

translation.en: Because before this is all over,
I'm gonna do to you
what every enlisted grunt secretly wants to do to every female officer.
translation.ja: 全歩兵が全女性将校に 密かにしたいことをな

translation.en: The only way you can get it, isn't it?
Hey. Another thing.
Never call a woman by anything other than her name.
translation.ja: 女性を名前以外で 呼ばないことね

translation.en: Not honey, or honey pie, or sugar, or sugar pie,
translation.ja: ハニー ハニーパイ シュガー シュガーパイ

translation.en: or sweetie, or sweetie pie.
translation.ja: スウィーティーもダメ

translation.en: Not baby, sweetheart, ho, bitch,
translation.ja: ベイビー 恋人 売春婦 メス犬もダメ

translation.en: and above all, most of all, beyond all else,
translation.ja: そして中でも断トツに 何にもまして

translation.en: don't ever, ever, call her "darlin'."
translation.ja: 女性を絶対に ダーリンと呼ぶんじゃない

translation.en: Satellite relay's live on the EBS.
translation.ja: ＥＢＳで衛星生中継 開始

translation.en: The Emergency Broadcast System?
Yeah, so that every camera on this rig
translation.ja: ああ ここの映像は すべてのネット機器に送れる

translation.en: can be broadcast to any device that has smart capabilities.
translation.ja: ここの映像は すべてのネット機器に送れる

translation.en: Wouldn't want anyone missing the show.
Mr. Kessel. Where's Captain Collins?
translation.ja: ケッセルさん コリンズ大尉は？

translation.en: She's here. She's unharmed.
Well… relatively.
As is Corporal Shah.
[Dyson] And Corporal Baker?
Howdy, General.
[Dyson] You two are servicemen. You took an oath. How could you betray your country?
translation.ja: 国に忠誠を誓ったのに 裏切るとは

translation.en: I swore an oath to the old America. Not this one.
translation.ja: 昔の国に誓ったんだ 今の国じゃない

translation.en: [Dyson] What do you want?
[Kessel] From you?
Nothing.
I'm just waiting for America to join our little chat here.
translation.ja: 国民が加わるのを待ってる

translation.en: Dad's proud. That must be nice.
translation.ja: 父親の誇りか いい気分だろうな

translation.en: EBS has slaved all signals.
translation.ja: 〝ＥＢＳ信号を受信〞 すべてＥＢＳの支配下よ

translation.en: Say hello to America, boss.
So you know it's got a big screen, great picture quality, you know,
translation.ja: 大きなスクリーンで 画質もいいよ

translation.en: the sound's kind of meh,
but I don't really listen to the TV that much.
I play music when I watch and stuff so it doesn't really…
Why'd it go black and white?
Where's the President?
I'm here.
If you launch even one of those missiles,
translation.ja: ミサイルを１発でも 発射したら

translation.en: I swear before God that we will hunt you down
translation.ja: ミサイルを１発でも 発射したら ミサイルを１発でも 発射したら セントルイス セントルイス セントルイス どこまでも追って 存在を消す

translation.en: and wipe you from existence.
translation.ja: セントルイス どこまでも追って 存在を消す

translation.en: That's enough. You're boring me.
translation.ja: もういい　退屈だよ

translation.en: I'm taking your bully pulpit now.
My fellow Americans, I am Alexander Kessel,
translation.ja: 親愛なるアメリカ国民よ アレグザンダー･ケッセルだ

translation.en: son of trust fund billionaire, Alexander Kessel Senior,
translation.ja: 親は大富豪 アレグザンダー･ ケッセル･シニア

translation.en: who you may also know
is the current utterly unqualified US ambassador to the United Nations.
translation.ja: もう資格を失っただろうが 現在のアメリカ国連大使だ

translation.en: Now, my associates in Russia control 16 nuclear missiles,
translation.ja: ロシアにいる俺の仲間は 16個の核ミサイルを支配し

translation.en: and I control the only interceptor missiles that are capable of stopping them.
translation.ja: 唯一の迎撃システムは 俺が支配している

translation.en: Sixteen American cities have been targeted.
translation.ja: アメリカの16都市が標的だ

translation.en: 300 million of you will die.
One city will be destroyed first
translation.ja: まず１つの都市を滅ぼす

translation.en: so that the rest of you can watch in horror.
translation.ja: 他の都市の人は見ててくれ

translation.en: Missile team one…
fire.
[computer voice] Missile launch detected. Missile launch detected. Missile launch detected.
Intercept launch expires in 12 minutes.
translation.ja: 迎撃可能時間は残り12分です

translation.en: [Kessel] Now in 12 minutes, that missile I just launched, will pass over my head,
translation.ja: 12分以内に ミサイルは頭上を通過し

translation.en: at which point, it will be too late for this interceptor to catch it.
translation.ja: その時点で 迎撃は間に合わなくなる

translation.en: But which city has been chosen?
Is it yours?
Wherever it lands, there's no time to run.
translation.ja: どこであれ 時間切れだ

translation.en: You can't flee.
If you guessed Los Angeles,
congratulations.
The City of Angels has 23 minutes left to live.
translation.ja: 天使の街の残り時間は23分

translation.en: Wait a second.
Once Los Angeles is gone, And the fear of every American is at its peak…
translation.ja: ロサンゼルスが消え 恐怖が極限に達したら…

translation.en: We're not closing yet.
…I will launch a second wave
of 15 nuclear missiles.
San Francisco, Seattle, Las Vegas,
translation.ja: サンフランシスコ シアトル ラスベガス

translation.en: Cincinnati, Dallas, Denver, Memphis, Chicago, St. Louis, Atlanta, Boston,
translation.ja: シンシナティ ダラス デンバー メンフィス シカゴ セントルイス アトランタ ボストン

translation.en: Philadelphia, Miami, New York.
translation.ja: フィラデルフィア マイアミ ニューヨーク

translation.en: And of course, Washington DC.
translation.ja: もちろん ワシントンＤＣも

translation.en: Today…
America dies in a paroxysm of fear.
translation.ja: アメリカは恐怖の発作で死ぬ

translation.en: America is the greatest lie ever told.
translation.ja: アメリカは最高のウソだ

translation.en: American exceptionalism?
Maybe once.
When the founders got rid of kings.
translation.ja: 建国の父が王を捨てた時

translation.en: When they declared that all men are created equal.
translation.ja: 人は平等だと宣言した時

translation.en: Now they say ours are United States, but when was that true?
translation.ja: だが真に 平等の国だったことはあるか

translation.en: Was it true during the Civil War?
Or Jim Crow?
Hell, is it true now?
You know, this national lie, it's a festering wound,
translation.ja: このウソは どんどん悪化してる

translation.en: and it's fatal.
There's no Band-Aid to patch it.
No, the only way to save our nation and the promise it once held
translation.ja: 俺たちの国を救い 掲げた約束を守るには

translation.en: is to erase it. Start over.
translation.ja: すべて消して やり直すしかない

translation.en: So maybe then.
translation.ja: がれきの向こうにいる人と 見つめ合う時こそ

translation.en: when we are staring at each other
translation.ja: がれきの向こうにいる人と 見つめ合う時こそ 〝迎撃まで〞

translation.en: from across the rubble,
translation.ja: がれきの向こうにいる人と 見つめ合う時こそ

translation.en: we will all agree that this time
translation.ja: 思いをひとつにできるはずだ

translation.en: we're going to get America right.
This is Corporal Rahul Shah.
translation.ja: 伍長のラウル･シャーだ

translation.en: Do you like being an American, Rahul?
With all my heart.
But you're a Hindu.
You can be both.
In America?
You've never been mocked for your faith?
Never been the subject to enhanced screenings at airports?
translation.ja: 空港で追加の検査を 受けたことは？

translation.en: Share with the world what you've seen.
I've seen you in the showers,
translation.ja: お前のシャワー姿を見た

translation.en: and I can see why you're obsessed with missiles.
translation.ja: ミサイル好きなわけだ

translation.en: Pathetic.
I got this, boss. [inhaling]
This is Captain Joanna Julia Collins.
translation.ja: ジョアンナ･ フリア･コリンズ大尉だ

translation.en: JJ to her friends.
A soldier who has fought with honor and courage here today.
translation.ja: 誇りと勇気を持って戦った

translation.en: Now, three years ago, one of our nation's top generals
tried to abuse his position of power and force her to have sex with him.
translation.ja: 権力を乱用して セックスを強要した

translation.en: Whose career was ruined?
You should be showering her with praise,
translation.ja: 本来ならＪＪを 称賛するべきだ

translation.en: but she's a woman,
so instead her fellow service members
translation.ja: だから仲間の軍人たちは

translation.en: put out a bounty hunt on photos like this.
translation.ja: こういう写真に賞金をかけた

translation.en: You're an asshole, dude.
I offered her 30 million dollars to give up her post today.
translation.ja: 彼女に3000万ドルで 寝返れと言った

translation.en: She refused.
She took that photo for charity, by the way.
translation.ja: 写真は チャリティーのためだった

translation.en: What position were you? Were you goalkeeper?
Goalkeeper. It's a tough position.
Beg your pardon?
You take a lot of hits, concussions, bruised ribs,
translation.ja: ケガが多い 脳震とう　打撲

translation.en: but the most common injury is dislocated thumbs.
translation.ja: でも一番多いのは 親指の脱臼よ

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Beaver] Oh shit.
[Kessel] No!
Shit! [panting]
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in six minutes.
translation.ja: 迎撃可能時間は残り６分です

translation.en: Think you can make it?
Do you?
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in five minutes.
translation.ja: 迎撃可能時間は残り５分です

translation.en: You have five minutes. Hold her or kill her.
[computer voice] Interceptor launched.
[computer voice] Missile intercepted.
Fucking die already, would you?
Remember? I said, "Whatever happens, make sure you shoot her first." [sniffs]
translation.ja: 覚えてるか？ “何があっても 最初にあいつを撃て”

translation.en: "You just take her out of the fight, because if you don't do that,
translation.ja: “何があっても 最初にあいつを撃て” “すぐに撃ち殺さないと 面倒を起こす”とな

translation.en: if you don't just put her down right away, man, she's gonna be trouble."
translation.ja: “すぐに撃ち殺さないと 面倒を起こす”とな

translation.en: Beaver.
She's… She's just one of those women, you know?
She just likes to just get under your skin and just needle you, man.
translation.ja: 人をイラつかせて弱点を突く

translation.en: Like a… like a fucking needle.
translation.ja: まったく 針みたいだぜ

translation.en: This is a setback and nothing more.
[Beaver] Setback?
Oh. Good.
Hey, did you hear that? It's a setback. That's cool.
translation.ja: 聞いたか？　後退だとさ

translation.en: She shot the goddamn missile out of the sky!
translation.ja: ミサイルを迎撃しやがった

translation.en: It's one missile. There are 15 left.
And what happens if she shoots them down too, huh?
What then? What do we do then?
Our faces, man, they're all over the world right now.
translation.ja: 俺らの顔は世界中にバレた

translation.en: What do we do then?
What's the statute of limitations on attempted nuking?
We are prepared for this. We have backup plans.
translation.ja: 準備はしてきた　代替策だ

translation.en: Really? [sighs]
You played that one pretty close to the buzzer.
[panting] Doing my best here, ma'am.
Can you turn off the TV coverage?
Give me a minute.
Not from here.
[Dyson] Understood.
How long till the SEALS get here?
Fifty minutes. They're going as fast as they can.
Not fast enough.
[Dyson] And we got some background on Alexander Kessel.
He was Army, military intelligence.
Started out doing Russian work, then became a psy ops and torture specialist.
translation.ja: ロシアを担当し 心理戦と拷問の専門家に

translation.en: [Collins] Torture?
[Dyson] He was good. Too good sometimes. Killed two prisoners while he was torturing them.
translation.ja: 腕が立ち過ぎて 拷問中に２人殺してる

translation.en: [Collins] Jesus. I'm dealing with a genuine psychopath.
You're not alone. Lot of smart people here trying to figure out a way to help you.
translation.ja: 優秀な人々が 君を助けようとしてる

translation.en: Tacticians, game theorists.
translation.ja: 戦術家やゲーム理論家

translation.en: Fuck theory. I need some fucking soldiers with guns.
translation.ja: 理論は無用よ 武装兵をよこして

translation.en: I hear you, Captain.
Come on, give her some guns, man.
If you don't mind me saying, you are one armor-plated woman. Army never should have picked a fight with you.
translation.ja: 君はタフな女性だ 陸軍は争うべきじゃなかった

translation.en: Got that right.
Rahul.
What'd I miss?
Not much.
Did we stop the missile?
Yeah. We stopped it.
translation.ja: ええ　撃ち落とした

translation.en: Nice.
Wait. Where's all the bad guys?
translation.ja: 待って　悪党どもは？

translation.en: That Alexander dude must be pissed at you.
translation.ja: あの男は怒り心頭だろうね

translation.en: Yeah, well, that's because I'm still fucking up his day.
translation.ja: あいつの夢を ぶち壊してるからね

translation.en: [Collins] Papa?
Hey. How you feeling?
You up for some soup?
Sure.
You saw what they did.
[Papa] I'll take care of it.
Do not let them get to you now. Don't let them win.
translation.ja: くじけるな ヤツらに勝たせるなよ

translation.en: They hate me.
You told the truth.
Nobody cares about the truth.
[Papa] I care.
I've lost everything. Everything I ever worked for.
translation.ja: 積み上げたものを すべて失った

translation.en: Hey, hey.
What's the one thing I've taught you since you were little?
translation.ja: 昔から教えてきたことは？

translation.en: The one rule in life?
Never stop fighting.
[Papa] You got fight in you, kid.
Always have. Just like your mama.
translation.ja: 昔からな 母さんと同じだ

translation.en: [Shah] Captain?
He wants to talk.
How long have I been out?
[Shah] Not long. Fifteen minutes or so.
[Collins] What now, asshole?
You think I'm a monster.
I was.
You know, growing up, I never summered where I wintered. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 夏と冬を 同じ場所で過ごさなかった

translation.en: I was either on a yacht in the Hamptons or skiing in Val d'Isère.
translation.ja: ハンプトンズでヨットか ヴァル･ディゼールでスキー

translation.en: Sucks to be you, dude.
I'm not complaining.
I was the product of a failed society.
translation.ja: 俺は失敗社会の産物だ

translation.en: A society that consistently rewards money and ignores everything else.
translation.ja: 常にカネを重視し 他を無視する社会のな

translation.en: What? You think my father became ambassador to the UN because of any worthwhile diplomatic skills
translation.ja: 父が国連大使になった理由は 外交手腕だと思うか？

translation.en: or because of his political donations?
See, that's what we do in America.
We just figure because someone's rich that means they're smart.
translation.ja: これがアメリカだよ 裕福なら賢いとみなされる

translation.en: My father's a moron.
He inherited his money. -He didn't earn it. -God.
Don't tell me this is about daddy issues.
translation.ja: 全部 父親のせいだと？

translation.en: I wouldn't expect you to understand.
I understand plenty.
Your father is a good man.
The best.
He served too, didn't he?
Thirty-six years.
[Kessel] That's how he met your mom? When he was stationed in Spain?
translation.ja: スペインで母親に会った？

translation.en: Does he still hang out with his army buddies?
translation.ja: まだ軍の仲間とつるんでる？

translation.en: [Collins] Every day.
In Scottsdale, right?
Yeah.
[Kessel] The Patriot's Valley Veterans Retirement Home.
translation.ja: パトリオットバレー 退役軍人の老人ホーム

translation.en: Room 6B.
Papa?
Let him go!
translation.ja: 解放して　父は関係ない

translation.en: -He's got nothing to do with this! -Beg to differ.
translation.ja: 解放して　父は関係ない 違う

translation.en: Let him go!
You said I could kill whoever, and you'd never open this door.
translation.ja: 誰でも殺せと言っただろ

translation.en: Let him go, God damn you!
-[Kessel] Let's see if that's still valid. -Fuck you!
translation.ja: まだ有効かな くたばれ！

translation.en: You think it's going to go any other way?
This is what I was trained for. Psy ops. Military intelligence.
translation.ja: これが軍で学んだ心理戦だ

translation.en: Find your enemy's weak point and exploit it.
translation.ja: 弱点を見つけ悪用する

translation.en: [gasps] Let him go!
If you don't open the door, I will take apart your father piece by piece.
translation.ja: 扉を開けないと バラバラにする

translation.en: No!
-Fine. Have it your way. -No, no! Please.
translation.ja: やめて！ 分かった　好きにしろ

translation.en: No, no, no!
-Do it. -No, no, no!
No, don't! No!
-[Collins] No, no, no! -[groaning]
-You know I can't. -[Kessel] Yes, you can.
translation.ja: 開けられない できるとも

translation.en: -No, I can't. -You can make this stop whenever you want.
Let me speak with him. Let me speak with him. Okay?

Danilov.

Danny?

[father] Rahul?

[father] I see.
